description: An entity (player) that acts or is authorized to act on behalf of another entity (scoper).
name: RoleClassAgent

text.div:
RoleClassAgent

An entity (player) that acts or is authorized to act on behalf of another entity (scoper).

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleClass where concept is-a AGNT
